message.name: SET_COMPANION_COMPUTER_WIFI
message.description: Setup the companion computers wifi as an access point or a client. If the ssid or pass fields are empty strings, the previous values will be used.

message.name: SET_COMPANION_COMPUTER_USB
message.description: Setup the companion computers USB connection to the camera.

message.name: COMPANION_COMPUTER_PREFLIGHT
message.description: Tell the companion computer to perform preflight operations, set the camera, and time
message.field: current time in milliseconds from EPOCH, in UTC
camType, a value in the CamType enum in sui-camera

message.name: PROCESSING_IMAGE
message.description: Identify the image being processed, by index.
